Articles.Content: I have a bunch of mods downloaded and the game crashes about 80 percent of the way through the start. It is connected to usi or module manager as when i dont use them it works fine. Not a Ram issue as my computer has 16 gigs. I have tried using a texture compresser and running in the 64 bit mode. The crash folder just says mono.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005) in module mono.dll at 0023:100704db. Some usi mods such as sounding rockets and akita work fine. Please help.
That probably means you're having a wrong version of the mod installed. A versions thats not made for your current Ksp version. Please provide us with some logs so we can help more.
